item.title: Useful Command Line Tools
item.author: cyrusncy@gmail.com (CyrusN)
item.description: TOC Basic Redirect operators Create multiple files or folders Useful Commands zsh tr copydir qlmanage airport pgrep and pkill shutdown textutil xargs Find files and delete them tmux ImageMagick (convert) ffmpeg http-server youtube-dl pt Pandoc http caddy jq top osx metadata Basic Redirect operators # pipe echo "hello world" | sed 's/ /_/' # redirect the standard output result to file (replace) echo "hello world" > test.
